messages.help:
Commands:🌊
 🤑 !account: show balance 
 ⚡ !register: creates an id 
 🌠 !withdraw <address> <unit>: withdraws your balance 
 ✨ !tip <nick> <amount> <unit>: tip a user 
 🌱 !terms: terms and conditions 
 😢 !deregister : Removes an existing account from database ✌ 

 Kindly note ☝, a valid unit is $mHLX, $hlx, etc and are case insensitive
